name: Runaway (Comi)
description:
Runaway is a 2D RPG game made for the "I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story" game jam of 2020. It is a short adventure of a robot put in a mysterious and weird circumstance.

The game is as of now incomplete, but we plan on finishing it by tomorrow

Coding - Comi

Animation, Design - Zota

Sound - Freesound

Platform - itch.io
